analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol:
	Contract XRRsale has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#159-170)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

XRRsale.tokenWithdraw (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#154-159) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokenTosale()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#157)

XRRsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#159-170) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#169-170)

XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#170-177) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol)

Reentrancy in XRRsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#159-170):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokens <= tokenTosale()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#167)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokenRaiseWei (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#167-169)

Reentrancy in XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#170-177):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_value <= tokenTosale()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#173-174)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalRaiseWei (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol)
	- totalTokenRaiseWei (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol)

XRRsale.ICO1 should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#109-110)
XRRsale.ICO2 should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#110-112)
XRRsale.ICO3 should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#112-113)
XRRsale.ICO4 should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#113-116)
XRRsale.ICOend should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#116)
XRRsale.PreSaleEnd should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#107-108)
XRRsale.PreSaleStart should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#105-106)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_token' of XRRsale.setToken (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#121) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wallet' of XRRsale.setWallet (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#126) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of XRRsale.checkAmount (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#137) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#172) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0xc40f35abf83710e0fe3c510ce8db4289603d26b4.sol#172) is not in mixedCase
